metadata.title: CVE-2020-1921 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the crypt function, we attempt to null terminate a buffer using the sizeof the input salt without validating that the offset is within the buffer.This issue affects HHVM versions prior to 4.56.3, all versions between4.57.0 and 4.80.1, all versions between 4.81.0 and 4.93.1, and versions4.94.0, 4.95.0, 4.96.0, 4.97.0, 4.98.0.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
